title: Resplendent Healing | Marnie Reasor, Certified Homeopath
author: Susan Kennedy
description: Marnie Reasor CCH provides relief to women suffering from a wide range of exhausting hormonal symptoms like menopause, fibroids, endometriosis.
sitename: Resplendent Healing - Marnie Reasor, Classical Homeopath
cleaned_text: When you're a woman who is always tired or in pain, you miss out on life. Who would you be if you just felt better? You don't know why you have... - Fatigue - Sleeplessness - Painful periods - Irritability and mood swings - Cramps and bloating - Hot flashes - Migraines - No motivation - Anxiety It doesn't matter why. It's too much. You suspect or know you have... - Hormonal imbalances - Fibroids - Endometriosis - Menopausal symptoms - PMS - Side effects from birth control - Herpes and cold sores - Breast Implant Illness - Frequent bladder infections It doesn't matter what. It's too much. You're chasing relief with... - Handfuls of supplements - Expensive lab tests - Multiple prescriptions - Complicated diets - Invasive surgery It doesn't matter how. It's too much. What if there were an easy, proven, and natural solution that could provide relief from all of your symptoms? What if you could feel light, bright, and energetic again? Hi there! I'm Marnie Reasor Certified Classical Homeopath I help women who suffer from exhausting hormonal and menopausal discomfort. My unique approach combines classical, integrative Homeopathy and Plant Stem Cells to create a solution that is customized for your specific symptoms and experience. I care for you as a whole person, to help you achieve the relief, peace of mind, and energy to fully enjoy your life. I've been blessed to work with Marnie Reasor for years of personal physical, emotional, mental and spiritual healing miracles, through the use of Homeopathy and Plant Stem Cells. Marnie is a true healer, working intuitively and practically to help me shift large and small patterns in my life. I trust her completely and utterly recommend her and her services. Marnie has been an amazing resource for my own health and the health of my patients. She has worked with me on many patient cases, and I find her skills to be extraordinarily helpful to assist patients in harnessing their healing potential. I admire her talent for finding the best remedy and her kindness and compassion in her work. Marnie is a truly gifted Homeopathic practitioner. I highly recommend her to take you to the next level. Marnie is committed to understanding her clients, and she also has incredible intuition. Her innate skills and professional training make her a fantastic Homeopathic Practitioner. I highly recommend working with Marnie, especially if you suffer from sleep issues, chronic stress, hormonal irregularity, or if you're in any kind of major life transition. Homeopathy Menopause Power Plant Stem Cells Switch ON your body's natural healing power! From Me, To You
